Hi

is there a way to handle readonly PROPERTIES?

I know that in the future there will be support for readonly columns, but in my business objects, there are some properties which are readonly, but I like to seem them in my datagrid.
But no matter which mode I choose I get an exception during window load (see below)

Regards
Klaus

Here is my binding xaml
               <dg:DataGridCheckBoxColumn Header="{StaticResource P.PrivateYN}"
                                          DataFieldBinding="{Binding Path=PrivateYN, Mode=OneWay}" />

Try using a template column without a CellEditingTemplate and for the CellTemplate make sure the binding Mode is OneWay.

Although you may have solved the issue till now. This post is to help others having the similar issue in future.

I'd similar issue and solved it using the following approach.

- When you bind a ReadOnly property using the Mode=OneWay, also notify the XAML tag/column by assigning it's property ReadOnly=True. This remove the error and binding happens smoothly.
e.g. in your case PrivateYN is readonly and you are assigning to datacolumn, you should use following xaml code.

<dg:DataGridCheckBoxColumn Header="{StaticResource P.PrivateYN}"
                                          DataFieldBinding="{Binding Path=PrivateYN, Mode=OneWay}" 
                                          ReadOnly="True" />
